channel.title: Posts on Fejix website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Fejix website

item.title: I created a website for Fejix
item.description: Hello world! I have been developing the idea of Fejix since August 2021 and finally decided that there are far too many ideas to store them in a handful of GitHub repos. Everything should be kept in one place and look nice. I’ve recently created a GitHub organisation called FejixGUI to dump everything dedicated to Fejix there. And all links at this site will bring you there. I used the name ‘FejixGUI’ because ‘Fejix’ was already taken.
